item.title: Configure Mikrotik with Cisco Aironet 3500 Series
item.description: Hey there… I found an old Cisco Aironet 3500 series and I had been wondering for a week maybe how to configure it. It has 2 radios, 2.4GHz and 5GHz, with 3 antennas each. Then what I wanted is 3 SSIDs of 2.4GHz and 1 SSID of 5GHz, and every SSID bound with a VLAN.
